attributes.action: ban all public parades and traditions connected with Orangeism and paramilitarism over the year in Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now just an excuse to wind people up. Let these celebrations be carried out somewhere away from main roads and those who are not interested in these matters do not have it shoved in their face and cause unnecessary disruption. We should also have the choice whether to introduce our children to these issues or not. Right now, we don't have the choice.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
